Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI was able to provide much more in depth feedback, with specific examples for improvement, whereas teachers just give vague, short bits of feedback. However the teachers' feedback is usually more specific to the content.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I don't take feedback from AI personally as it has no emotions attached, and gives unbiased feedback, whereas sometimes feedback from teachers can be more emotive and be taken personally.
